meanings.definition: A person who dubs or gives a name or nickname to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The dubbers in the group came up with funny nicknames for each other.
meanings.sent2: The dubbers at the naming ceremony gave special titles to all the newborns.
meanings.sent3: The dubbers decided to play a game where they gave silly names to their pets.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the dubber of the family, always coming up with creative names for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The dubbers in the storybook village had a magical power to name things into existence.
